attributes.action: Build council houses to kick start econemy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my view that the building indestry could kick start the econemy if the govement buit up the stock of council houses that are in short supply . This would create jobs in manufacturing for 100s of companys with 1000s of emplyees and the knock on efect for shops etc .
